channel.title: Subversion on zzamboni.org
channel.description: Recent content in Subversion on zzamboni.org

item.title: Storing CFEngine configuration in CVS
item.description: via sial.org Useful article about storing both development and production configurations of cfengine using a version control mechanism. I am in the process of developing a similar setup using git, I will share it here when I get it to work properly.
